Just downloaded this torrent in hopes of completing my Avenged Sevenfold FLAC collection. I found that this is a collection of 128kbps mp3's from Nightmare, rather than FLAC format, one or two of the songs are at 256kbps and God Hates Us is at 320kbps. I don't care that much, I'm fine with the 320kbps version of the album that I already have, but just so you guys know...
